content.question: Which of the following descriptions is accurate?

choices.label: An attribute of the penelope object is email.
An attribute of the penelope object is Parent.
An attribute of the penelope object is Student.
An attribute of the mrsPatel object is email.

content.answer: An attribute of the mrsPatel object is email.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
